titleStmt.title: Bartas Iunior: or, The worlds epitome; man Set forth in his 1. generation, 2. degeneration, 3. regeneration.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Edward, fl. 1626-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for Francis Coules, and are to be solde at his shoppe in the Olde Baylie, neere to Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some leaves cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in the Olde Baylie, neere to Newgate
